org.dgfoundation.amp.ar.viewfetcher

Interface PropertyDescription

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DgEditorPropertyDescription, GeneratedPropertyDescription, InternationalizedPropertyDescription

    public interface PropertyDescription
    these are indexed in the map by their hashCode() / equals() functions, so be sure to make those meaningful

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      boolean allIdsHaveValues()
      if true - ALL ids of this field should have values (example - multilingual-backed ones).

      nice, human readable, description, for debugging

      boolean isCalculated()
      false - this is a regular translated column.

    • Method Detail

      • isCalculated

        boolean isCalculated()
        false - this is a regular translated column. true - this is a row-by-row calculated column, it shouldn't be cached and can't be "generateValues()"'ed
        Returns:

        boolean getDeleteOriginal()
        should the SQL query rewriter delete the original column value (<'' AS columnName>) for bandwidth saving purposes?)

      • allIdsHaveValues

        boolean allIdsHaveValues()
        if true - ALL ids of this field should have values (example - multilingual-backed ones). Is false, for example, for DG_EDITOR-backed ones, as an entry might be translated into Romanian only and we are running an English report
        Returns:
